id: Cleaning Schedule / Household Tracker for Notion
name: Cleaning Schedule / Household Tracker for Notion
description: Pick from the free cleaning schedule or go for the more detailed household tracker which includes extras such as meal planning, shopping lists, recipe bank.Both options include the icons used in dark & light mode to suit your preferences ☺︎Key features are:40 pre-existing taskstoggle options for large households with multiple rooms / peopleicons to suit both light & dark modeoverview page for at a glance (household tracker version)Thank you for the lovely response to the first Notion tem
features: 40 pre-existing tasks; toggle options for large households with multiple rooms / people; icons to suit both light & dark mode; overview page for at a glance (household tracker version)
